about_the_game:
Fast:Run is a fast-paced racing game that challenges your reflexes and speed. Your goal is to complete levels as quickly as possible without failing

The game features a variety of levels, each with its own unique set of challenges. You'll need to jump, and dodge to make your way through each level. The faster you complete a level, the higher your score.

Fast:Run also includes a leaderboard system, allowing you to compete with other players around the world. Can you outrun them all and claim the top spot? With its simple controls and addictive gameplay, Fast:Run is a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Game Modes

  • Practice (Train on a specific level)

  • Racing (Get the best time by covering all the maps, alone or against other players)

  • Infinite (Run on a randomly generated infinite map)

Features

  • Multiplayer

  • Leaderboard

  • Ghost of the best times (Understand how the best players play)

  • Wall Jump

  • Boost In Air

  • Jump Pad

  • Zipline

  • Various powerups

Updates planned:

  • Add a level editor

  • Workshop (mod.io)

  • Cross Platform

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: IntelCore i3 gen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Fast:Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: IntelCore i3 gen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
